item.title: BlackRock's iShares bitcoin fund sees record exodus as crypto heads for worst month since 2022
item.description: Blackrock's spot bitcoin ETF has so far seen $2.2 billion worth of outflows in November as its underlying crypto continues to crater.

item.title: Michael Burry launches newsletter to lay out his AI bubble views after deregistering hedge fund
item.description: "The Big Short" investor is capitalizing on the massive audience he's built on X, where 1.6 million followers have long parsed his cryptic posts.
